article_title: WATCH: States look to act on nuclear power
article_text:
Reporters Molly K. Hooper and Devin Henry discuss what states are doing to push nuclear energy use.

This video is part of America's Nuclear Energy Future series, sponsored by the Nuclear Energy Institute (NEI). For more information about NEI, visit http://futureofenergy.nei.org.
